title: Archive through May 09, 2003
content:
Or maybe I'll just declare Eduardo the winner.   
He's the one who did all the work. Hats off to John for the tricky one.   
   
Matha
author: matha_standun

comments.content:
Hey. It's gone all quiet in here. Is that tumbleweed I can see blowing across the forum?   
   
C.
I certainly think Eduardo deserves to win this one.

Ok then, that settles it. Eduardo's the winner.   
   
M

And just in case anyone's interested in word games, here's a link to more images than you can shake a stick at:   
   
 [http://www.gtoal.com/wordgames/images-new/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023224837/http:/www.gtoal.com/wordgames/images-new/)   
   
(it's a bit slow to load though)   
   
Matha
So is eduardo going to continue with the quiz??
I don't know, Hector. Am I allowed to do it? ;-)
Go for it.

Ok then.   
   
There's an Emigre typeface which \*name\* makes reference to a   
famous book written by Aldous Huxley. What's the name of that   
typeface? And what's the name of the book?

Citizen, Brave New World   
   
(?)

That's the right book, but the typeface is wrong.   
I don't think the word "citizen" is such a reference   
for this book either.   
   
If you know which is the longest river in Africa,   
you'll probably figure out the answer to this quiz.   
   
;-)

well, I'm not sure what the Huxley reference is, but I   
believe Tarzan operated near the Nile... Tarzana?

Not Tarzana, sorry. Think about "the greatest   
moralizing and socializing force of all time."   
Hope this will help you! =D
If you have the book around, check chapter 2 please. ;-)

Eduardo -   
   
Arbitrary   
Brave New World

I hate to answer this now because I don't have a   
question of my own and I'm on my way out of the   
office. if anyone wants to take my trivia spot, please   
help yourself. (assuming I've got the answer....)   
   
Hypnopaedia, BNW
Yep!

You got it now, plainclothes! Congrats! ;-)   
Now, since you allowed that, I think that's fair   
to let Bj ask our next question.

Eduardo - Sorry, I don't have anything   
really good.   
   
I was saying, Yep, as in   
Yeah, that's right, PC got it.   
   
but thanks...   
   
   
bj

I know what you meant, Bj. ;-)   
And I'm going offline soon, so I'll leave this   
quiz in hands of our dear Quizmaster.   
Have a nice weekend, folks!

I'll take that back. I do have a question.   
If that's okay with the Quizmaster.   
   
I'll wait the standard hour.   
   
   
bj   
   
charity case

My other Q. was really obscure, so this one   
is more mainstream/easy.   
   
apologies.   
   
Name the typographer who designed this logo...   
What is the product...   
   
bj ![typo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023224837im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/30/10634.jpg)
leggs pantyhose -- oh sheesh -- paul rand
Tiffany - 1 for 2
hint: he was a rule basher.

nope. This particular   
rule basher+type designer   
died within the past 25 years.

gotta go in five or ten minutes.   
   
googleable given clues above   
   
   
bj
Got it!
